AUTHOR: orels1
DESCRIPTION:
Requires tabulate, dota2py and beautfulSoup
Install with:
pip3 install bs4
pip3 install dota2py
pip3 install tabulate

Also requires dota 2 api key, which you can get here: http://steamcommunity.com/dev/apikey
You will need to set your key with [p]dota setkey command in PM

Usage:
[p]dota hero <hero>
 Shows info about hero
[p]dota build <hero>
 Shows most popular skillbuild
[p]dota items <hero>
 Shows most popular items
[p]dota online
 Shows amount of players online
[p]dota recent <steamID>
 Shows info about the latest dota match
NAME: Helps you cover your DOTA 2 needs
